name: 2018 5th International Conference on Power and Energy Systems Engineering (CPESE 2018)_Ei,Scopus
content: Publication: Accepted and Registered full papers will be published in Energy Procedia (ISSN: 1876-6102), indexed by Elsevier: SCOPUS, Ei Compendex (CPX). \*\*CPESE 2016 & CPESE 2017 papers were indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus == Submission: Please submit your full paper to us: cpese@zhconf.ac.cn == Invited Speakers: Prof. Tony C.Y. Chung(Fellow of IEEE), University of Saskatchewan, Canada; Prof. Hassan Bevrani, University of Kurdistan, Iran; Prof. Toshihisa FUNABASHI, IMaSS, Nagoya University, Japan; Prof. Zhixin Wang, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China; Prof. Kien Wen Sun, National Chiao Tung University, Taiwan. == Contact us: Ms. Sasha S.S. Pan Email:cpese@zhconf.ac.cn Websiteï¼šwww.cpese.net Tel: +86-28-83533337
